text: The Ghost and Molly McGee is an upcoming American musical animated comedy television series produced by Disney Television Animation. The series was created by Bill Motz and Bob Roth. The series is scheduled to premiere on Disney Channel in early 2021. ==Plot== The series follows Molly McGee (voiced by Ashly Burch), an optimistic tween, who lives to make the world a better place, and a grumpy, deep voiced ghost named Scratch (voiced by Dana Snyder), whose joy comes from spreading misery. When one of his spells backfires, Scratch finds himself forever cursed to be in Molly's presence. == Voice cast == * Molly McGee (voiced by Ashly Burch), an optimistic tween girl. * Scratch (voiced by Dana Snyder), a grumpy ghost cursed to be alongside Molly. == Production == In July 23, 2019, Disney Channel greenlit an animated series titled The Curse of Molly McGee. The series, produced by Disney Television Animation, will be executive-produced by Bill Motz, Bob Roth, and Steve Loter. In September 24, 2020, Ashly Burch and Dana Snyder joined the series in its lead roles. The same day, the series was retitled The Ghost and Molly McGee. The crew used several songs as inspiration from the series.Here’s #theghostandmollymcgee Inspiration playlist. Can you guess what these songs are telling you about the show? More added each week. Motz released a playlist featuring those songs throughout 2020.The Ghost and Molly McGee Inspiration Animation for the series will be handled by Mercury Filmworks.@mercuryfilmwrks will be the animation studio behind #TheGhostAndMollyMcGee === Music === The series' theme song was written by Allie Feder, Mike Kramer, Motz, and Roth, and was performed by Burch and Snyder.Disney's The Ghost and Molly McGee First Look [EXCLUSIVE] Songs for the series will be written by Rob Cantor and Michael Tavera, with each episode featuring a musical sequence of approximately 1 minute. ==References== Category:American children's animated horror television series Category:American children's animated comedy television series Category:Television series about ghosts Category:Upcoming animated television series Category:Animated television series about teenagers Category:Television series by Disney Television Animation Category:Disney Channel original programming
